name: Wasn't It A Good Summer?
description:
As the first few thousand leaves fall & the whole neighborhood is on maple tree watch (looking for that perfect day when the leaves are on fire & the sky is so blue it hurts) we take stock of the summer.  Projects done? Yes. Garden? Yup. So wasn't it a good summer?  Always!

90% Superwash Merino, 10% Nylon
Suggested Needle Size 0-2 US
Fingerling Weight/Variegated
480 yards
Machine Washable in cold water, lay flat to dry
Hand dyed in Lincoln, Nebraska

name: Sea Glass Salesman
description:
Imagine a guy that has been combing the beach for the best beach glass for years.  He has a shop that sells these odds & ends, but his hours aren't set in stone.  He may open his shop mid afternoon, after lunch & a beer, but he may not.  If he wasn't open for you to buy the glass on vacation, at least you can knit it!  All of his best colors ended up in this yarn!


90% Superwash Merino, 10% Nylon
Suggested Needle Size 0-2 US
Fingerling Weight/Variegated
480 yards
Machine Washable in cold water, lay flat to dry
Hand dyed in Lincoln, Nebraska

name: Zeus Saves the Day (again)
description:
Royal Purple, Steel Grey, Thunderbolt Orange and Top of the Mountain Blue parade down your leg in perfect lines.  This sock yarn will make you feel like the king (or queen) of the gods.


90% Superwash Merino, 10% Nylon
Suggested Needle Size 0-2 US
Fingerling Weight/Self-Striping Yarn
480 yards
Machine Washable in cold water, lay flat to dry
Hand dyed in Lincoln, Nebraska
